author: Pablo Ruiz Picasso
title:
Femme nue couchée au
collier(Marie-Thérèse)
story:
1932 is widely regarded as one of the greatest years of Picasso's career. In the first half of this seminal year, Pablo Picasso painted of his blonde haired muse and lover, Marie-Thérèse Walter. Painted on 18th June 1932, Femme nue couchée au collier(Marie-Thérèse) is one of the rhapsodic outpouring of colorful, love-filled paeans. One of the artist's greatest muses, Marie-Thérèse's presence in Picasso's life aroused an unprecedented creative explosion; 'There is no doubt,' William Rubin declared, 'that 1932 marks the peak of fever-pitch intensity and achievement, a year of rapturous masterpieces that reach a new and unfamiliar summit in both his painting and sculpture' (Picasso and Portraiture: Representation and Transformation, New York, 1996, p. 361).

"Femme nue couchée au collier(Marie-Thérèse)" was purchased with a price of GBP 14,582,500 at Christie's auction on 23 Mar 2021.
cstory:
1932年是巴勃罗·毕加索人生中的关键年份。在这一年的上半年里，他为自己的金发情人与缪思女神玛丽-泰蕾兹·沃尔特（Marie-Thérèse Walter）献上了一系列色彩绚丽、饱含爱意的赞歌。绘制于1932年6月18日的《戴项链的躺卧裸女》就是其中一幅。玛丽-泰蕾兹是毕加索最重要的缪思女神之一，她在他生命中的出现引起了一场前所未有的创作风暴。威廉·鲁宾（William Rubin）表示，“1932年标志着毕加索达到了狂热激情和艺术成就的一个高峰，那是奔放杰作迭出的一年，是毕加索画作与雕塑作的一次全不同于以往的新高潮” （Picasso and Portraiture: Representation and Transformation, New York, 1996, p. 361）。

2021年3月23日，毕加索作品《戴项链的躺卧裸女》以14,582,500英镑的价格从佳士得拍得。

author: BEEPLE
title: OCEAN FRONT
story:
This work represents Beeple's art life and speaks to the deep concern for global warming. Full of environmental value, this art piece undoubtedly is one of the best NFT works.

"OCEAN FRONT" by Beeple was purchased with a price of $6,000,000 at Nifty Gateway on 23 Mar 2021.
cstory:
该作品是Beeple整个艺术人生的凝结，蕴含着对地球气候变化的忧思，背后具有深刻的环保意义，毫无疑问这是整个NFT行业的最佳作品之一。

2021年3月23日，Beeple作品《OCEAN FRONT》以6,000,000美金的价格从Nifty Gateway拍得。

author: Andy Warhol
title: Three Self-Portraits
story:
A true landmark in the history of art, Andy Warhol's 1986 self-portrait stands among his most iconic images. Created just months before his death, it takes its place alongside masterworks by Rembrandt, Van Gogh, Picasso and other artists who took their own aging visage as their last great subject. Adorned with a so-called 'fright wig', the artist's skull-like face looms large amid a deep black void, haunting and enigmatic. Three Self-Portraits, a trio of heads confronts the viewer, vividly rendered in green, silver and yellow. The work is notable for its triptych structure: like Francis Bacon, who made similar use of the format for his own late self-portraits, the artist stages a bold encounter with his mortality, meeting our gaze three times with his own penetrating stare. It is a final flourish from one of the twentieth century's greatest cultural giants: an image that continues to keep the world guessing.

"Three Self-Portraits" was purchased with a price of GBP 1,462,500 at Christie's auction on 23 Mar 2021.
cstory:
1986年的自画像是安迪·沃霍尔最具标志性的形象之一，也是艺术史上的一座真正的丰碑。安迪·沃霍尔在去世几个月前创作了这组作品，与伦勃朗、梵高、毕加索等同样以自画像作为人生最后一个重大题材的画家同列。画家形销骨立的头颅上戴着一顶所谓的“小丑假发“，在幽深空洞的背景中显得格外大，可怕而又神秘。《三幅自画像》采用正面视角，分别染成鲜明的绿色、银色和黄色。三联画布局引人注目：弗朗西斯·培根曾用类似的形式来表现晚年的自己，安迪·沃霍尔借此直面自己必死凡人的真相，用犀利的眼光与我们展开三场凝视。同时，画中又点缀着黑色幽默、颠覆常理与角色扮演的意味，正适合这样一位身份与形象永远笼罩在狡计中的艺术家。这是20世纪最伟大的文化巨人之一的最后一次盛大演出：一幅至今依然让世人揣测的画像。

2021年3月23日，《三幅自画像》以1,462,500英镑的价格从佳士得拍得。
esold: The NFT titled Andy Warhol's "Three Self-Portraits" has sold on BinanceNFT "Genesis" auction for a spectacular $2.8 million.
csold: 安迪·沃霍尔的《三幅自画像》NFT作品在Binance NFT“Genesis”主题拍卖会以280万美元的价格成交。

author: BEEPLE
title: BIOLOGICAL COLLECTIBLE
story: The collections consist of five art pieces (Abundance, Gigachad, Rebirth, Biological Collectible and January 1st, 2021) in the form of both NFTs and physical artworks. The artworks are displayed on framed, programmable LED screens with an aluminium base, and the screens will present a unique color pattern when switched on. This is the first time Beeple has released NFT artworks in the physical form.
cstory: 这套NFT作品，包含5幅NFT艺术品（《ABUNDANCE》, 《GIGACHAD》, 《REBIRTH》, 《BIOLOGICAL COLLECTIBLE》, 《JANUARY 1ST, 2021》）和对应的5件NFT实物。其中，NFT实物由铝制底座、边框和带有自定义编程的LED屏幕组成，并在点亮时拥有独一无二的颜色模式，这是Beeple首次推出附带实物的NFT艺术品。

author: BEEPLE
title: ABUNDANCE
story: The collections consist of five art pieces (Abundance, Gigachad, Rebirth, Biological Collectible and January 1st, 2021) in the form of both NFTs and physical artworks. The artworks are displayed on framed, programmable LED screens with an aluminium base, and the screens will present a unique color pattern when switched on. This is the first time Beeple has released NFT artworks in the physical form.
cstory: 这套NFT作品，包含5幅NFT艺术品（《ABUNDANCE》, 《GIGACHAD》, 《REBIRTH》, 《BIOLOGICAL COLLECTIBLE》, 《JANUARY 1ST, 2021》）和对应的5件NFT实物。其中，NFT实物由铝制底座、边框和带有自定义编程的LED屏幕组成，并在点亮时拥有独一无二的颜色模式，这是Beeple首次推出附带实物的NFT艺术品。
esold: Beeple's ABUNDANCE was sold for $250,000 at the NFT Auction Dinner of WDAS 21×Huobi Charity, and all proceeds went to Huobi Charity to support the global fight against the COVID-19 pandemic, autistic people, gender equality, racial equality and environmental projects.
csold: Beeple的画作《ABUNDANCE》在WDAS 21×Huobi Charity 的 NFT 拍卖晚宴中，以25万美元（约150万人民币）的价格拍出，善款全部捐赠给 Huobi Charity，用于助力全球抗击新冠、自闭症患者、支持男女平权、种族平权、环境保护项目等。

author: Pak
title: CUBE
story: Fungible Open Editions enable collectors to purchase as many fungible cubes as they wish during the sale period. These fungible cubes can be purchased individually or many at a time, and will deliver its collector a different set of NFTs based on the total cubes they own.
cstory: 开放版的“立方体”（cube），也是拍卖会的重点作品。拍卖期间，竞拍者可以以固定价格无限量购入“立方体”。所有“立方体”将作为基本单位，用以组成不同的NFT代币，买家将根据所拍的“立方体”总数，获得相应的NFT代币。

author: Boris Artzybasheff
title:
The Computer in Society
April 2nd, 1965
story:
"The Computer in Society April 2nd, 1965" was created by artist Boris Artzybasheff and was selected on the cover of "Time" magazine on April 2, 1965, depicting a vibrant, a lifelike machine with a big brain, it eagerly got punch cards and data from the staff below. This is the first cover article of Time, introducing a machine that "begins to influence the structure of society". In 2021, recommended by the famous Internet entrepreneur Marc Russell Benioff, the NFT work "the computer in society April 2nd, 1965" was generated.

"The Computer in Society April 2nd, 1965" was purchased with a price of $209,736 at SuperRare on March 31, 2021.
cstory:
《THE COMPUTER IN SOCIETY》由艺术家鲍里斯·阿尔茨巴舍夫(BORIS ARTZYBASHEFF)创作，入选1965年4月2日《时代》杂志封面，描绘了一个充满活力的，栩栩如生的机器。它的大脑很大，急切地从下面的工作人员那里得到打孔卡和数据。这是时代杂志首批介绍计算机这种“影响社会结构”的封面之一。正如“时代“周刊在这篇5000字的封面故事中所写的那样:“在以计算机为终极表现的技术浪潮的推动下，人类社会肯定会发生一些深刻的变革。“2021年，经著名互联网企业家马克·罗素·贝尼奥夫(MARC RUSSELL BENIOFF)的推荐进行了NFT化，生成“THE COMPUTER IN SOCIETY APRIL 2ND, 1965”的NFT作品。

2021年3月31日，《The Computer in Society April 2nd, 1965》的NFT作品以209,736美金的价格从SuperRare拍得。

author: BCA Gallery
title: Klimt
story: This artwork is collected at the "Huobi Night, Road to Rising" party hosted by Huobi. APENFT collected five NFT pieces out of the eight featured during the NFT Charity Auction. These artworks include "Klimt" by BCA Gallery, "KIII" by Liang Hongwei, "The Crow" by Gabriella Barouch, "Huobian Dream" by Dutch multimedia artist Jivinci and "Huo-Beam!!" by Indonesian artist Twisted Vacancy.
cstory: 该幅画作拍自火币主办的“火币之夜，崛起之路”联谊酒会，本次拍卖一共有8幅作品，APENFT收录了其中五幅，这些作品包括BCA Gallery的《Klimt》，梁宏伟的《KIII》，Gabriella Barouch的《The Crow》，荷兰跨界数字艺术家Jivinci的《Huobian Dream》，以及印度尼西亚艺术家Twisted Vacancy的《Huo-Beam!!》。

author: Whale Pass
title: Forever Whale
story: Forever Whale, the first-ever Golden Whale Pass as an NFT, gives the holder lifetime whale access to all future Bitcoin Conference events as well multiple VIP benefits at the Bitcoin 2021 conference.  The hammer price of 12.6 BTC makes the Golden Whale Pass the highest-priced Bitcoin NFT ever. The NFT was created by 6 crypto artists, and it also represents a significant step in exploring the versatility of Bitcoin.
cstory:
The Golden Whale Pass是比特币大会的VIP入场券，《Forever Whale》 是其首个NFT版本。《Forever Whale》的持有者，不仅可以参与比特币大会今后的所有活动，还将获得包括5张梅威瑟VS洛根保罗比赛的名人套房门票在内的6项VIP权益。Forever Whale以12.6个比特币（48万美元）的价格成交，这是目前比特币NFT的最大交易。

《Forever Whale》由6位开创性的NFT艺术家合作创作，代表了比特币的起源和探索比特币难以置信的多功能性过程中意义非凡的一步。

author: KAWS
title: UNTITLED (KIMPSONS)
story:
Highly iconic, the present work was created during one of KAWS’ most important career milestones – the creation of his first acrylic paintings on canvases in 2001. Created for the artist’s first solo exhibition in Tokyo in the same year, the very special series featured KAWS’ KIMPSONS hybrid characters with his well-known iconography of X-ed out eyes and puffy crossbones. These first acrylic works, titled THE PACKAGE PAINTING SERIES, mark an important milestone in KAWS’ career due to multiple reasons: not only were they his first canvas works; they were presented in the same kind of plastic blister packaging used by toy manufacturers.

This was purchased at the JAY CHOU x SOTHEBY’S "Contemporary Curated: Asia" auction. This art sale marks the first crossover between Sotheby's and the legendary Asian pop star Jay Chou, who, as the curator of the first “CONTEMPORARY CURATED: ASIA”, is an icon in the entertainment world and an avid art collector renowned in both Asian and global art space. During the auction, Jay will also share his insights with the audience on the valuable lots of the evening sale.
cstory:
KAWS在2001年开始用压克力彩在画布上作画，成就其艺术生涯中无比重要的里程碑，本作的创作时间与这个时期吻合，极具代表意义。KAWS为准备当年首个在东京开办的个展，特意创作了一个非常特别的系列，系列里的角色名为「KIMPSONS」，有着广为人知的KAWS式招牌交叉眼和浑圆的骷髅头。这些首批压克力彩作品被命名为“包装画”系列，开启了KAWS事业上的关键阶段，这是KAWS首次以画布创作的系列，并以玩具制造商使用的塑料壳作为包装。

这件作品来自华语流行曲天王周杰伦与苏富比携手打造的“Contemporary Curated: Asia”晚间拍卖。这次的艺术策展是苏富比与周杰伦进行的首次跨界合作，作为首届“CONTEMPORARY CURATED：ASIA”策展人，周杰伦除了在娱乐界蜚声国际，同时也是一位充满热忱的艺术收藏家，在亚洲及国际艺术界稳占一席位，在拍卖会期间，周杰伦还会和观众分享他对晚间拍卖精选拍品的独到见解。

author: FEWOCiOUS
title: My Mama's Dream
story:
An inspiring young talent, FEWOCiOUS has exploded onto the art scene in the past year at only 18 years old, by defying norms and breaking barriers with his digital art.

Each of FEWOCiOUS’ five new 1/1 NFT auction pieces and paintings captures a year of his growth and the transformation of both his artwork and his inspiring journey from Las Vegas to Seattle, and from Victoria to Victor Langlois. Each 1/1 piece is paired with a 1/1 original painting plus a collection of newly and never before minted doodles, drawings and journal entries, hand selected from his archives from that year (14 for year 14, 15 for year 15, and so on).
cstory:
AFEWOCiOUS 是一位年轻的天才，在过去的一年里，年仅18岁的他通过挑战规范，打破障碍，用数字艺术迅速闯入了艺术舞台。

《My Mama's Dream》是“THIS IS MY LIFE”系列作品之一。该系列作品通过艺术讲述FEWOCiOUS在14至18岁之间的成年故事，内容包括五幅新的数字作品、实物画作，以及他早期每年创作的未被大家见过的作品档案。
